nodes.text: The Kassido Bypass was a bypass of the Senex-Juvex Loop in Juvex sector. It originated at Kassido and diverted away from the primary hyperlane, where it served at least four minor systems, until rejoining with the Loop at Malador.
The Kassido Bypass was included in a map of the Senex and Juvex sectors in the 2009 reference guide The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry.
